  • Constructor Details

    • Lamp

      public Lamp​(Color color, Color lampShadeColor, double radius, double radius1, PointLight lightLamp, Vector v1, Vector v2)
      constructor. transparency ball that contain a point light/ spot light. and a long wire.
      Parameters:
      color - - the color of the light ball
      lampShadeColor - -the color of lamp Shade
      radius - -the radius the light ball
      radius1 - - the radius of little ball between the lamp and the wire.
      lightLamp - - the light of the lamp.
      v1 - - the direction of the lamp.
      v2 - - a vector that vertical to v1.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the vectors v1 and v2 are not vertical.
